step1.title: User Registration
step1.subtitle: Create your account to start the application

step2.title: Identity Information
step2.subtitle: Please enter your real identity information

step3.title: Upload ID
step3.subtitle: Please upload clear photos of the front and back of your ID

step4.title: Contact Information
step4.subtitle: Please enter information for two contacts

step5.title: Liveness Detection
step5.subtitle: Please record a 3-second selfie video for identity verification
step5.livenessDesc: Record a 3-second video looking at the camera
step5.recordingDesc: Recording... Keep your face in front of the camera
step5.recordingHint1: Make sure you have good lighting
step5.recordingHint2: Keep your entire face in the frame
step5.recordingHint3: Keep your face in front of the camera for 3 seconds
step5.recordingHint4: Don't wear a hat or cover your face

step6.title: Credit Authorization
step6.subtitle: Please read and accept the credit authorization agreement
step6.agreementPurposeDesc: To evaluate your credit situation, we need to query your personal credit report. This agreement aims to obtain your explicit authorization.
step6.agreementScopeDesc: The authorized inquiry content includes, but is not limited to: credit records, public records, inquiry records and other credit information.
step6.agreementPrivacyDesc: We are committed to strictly protecting your personal information, used only for loan review purposes, and will not be disclosed to third parties.
step6.agreementPeriodDesc: This authorization is valid for 30 days, limited to this loan application.
step6.agreementOtherDesc: You have the right to know the results of the credit inquiry. If you have objections, you can request a review from the corresponding credit institution.
step6.agreementExplanation: By signing this agreement, you expressly authorize the inquiry of your credit information for loan evaluation purposes.
step6.creditAuthorizationLabel: I have read and agree to the Personal Credit Inquiry Authorization Agreement

step7.title: Bank Card Information
step7.subtitle: Please enter your bank card information to receive funds
step7.securityHint1: • We only accept debit cards from recognized Mexican banks
step7.securityHint2: • Your banking information is protected with bank-level encryption
step7.securityHint3: • We never share your information with third parties

step8.title: Submit Loan Application
step8.subtitle: Please confirm your application information and submit it
step8.importantHint1: • Make sure all information is correct
step8.importantHint2: • Once submitted, the application cannot be modified
step8.importantHint3: • You will receive a response in 2-5 minutes
step8.importantHint4: • Keep your phone available for notifications

step9.title: Processing Application
step9.subtitle: We are reviewing your application, this will take a few moments

step10.title: Application Approved!
step10.subtitle: Congratulations! Your application has been approved
step10.approvedDesc: Congratulations! Your application has been approved
step10.nextStep1: • Select the amount you want to withdraw
step10.nextStep3: • Confirm withdrawal and receive money in your account

step12.title: Withdrawal Completed!
step12.subtitle: Funds will be transferred to your bank account shortly
step12.successMessage: Your withdrawal has been processed successfully!
step12.importantNote1: • Keep your phone available, we will send a confirmation SMS
step12.importantNote2: • The first payment date is 30 days after disbursement
step12.importantNote3: • You can view your payment plan in the user center
step12.importantNote4: • Early payment is allowed without penalty
